profile_positions.description:
The  OXAGON  Port  is  located  within  the  center  of  OXAGON  and  will  provide  a  major  gateway  for  containerized  goods  and  general  cargo  into  NEOM  and  further  afield  in  the  Kingdom  and  beyond  to  neighboring  countries.   

The  Port  expansion  is  to  be  developed  on  the  site  of  the  existing  Port  of  Duba,  maximizing  utilization  of  the  existing  footprint  and  minimizing  greenfield  development.  Currently  the  port  primarily provides Ro-Ro services for cargo and passengers travelling onto Egypt and countries bordering the Red Sea. The Port provides OXAGON with a direct link to the international shipping lanes passing  through  the  Suez  Canal.
profile_positions.title: Project HS Manager Design and Build Oxagon Port Dredging and Quay Wall Stage 1 in Saudi Arabia
Project SHEQ Manager Middle East

profile_positions.description:
The capital dredging work scope includes the deepening and widening of the 4.5km access channel and port basins. The capital dredging involves the removal of approximately 11 million cubic meters of sand and clay, and the project will be executed with medium sized hoppers. Besides dredging, Boskalis will also conduct a wide array of marine services ranging from installing and management of navigation aids through to hydrographic and land surveying activities for the client.
The subsequent optional maintenance work of the access channel and basins is to be conducted with medium sized hoppers.
profile_positions.title: SHEQ Manager Soyo Maintenance Dredging ’22-’28 Angola

profile_positions.description:
-	Perform Incident analyses
-	Tender support
-	Support “Work Safe in the Sun” program.
-	Project support Cofra, MIA and Pasay projects
profile_positions.title: Project SHEQ Manager

profile_positions.description:
As part of the Arctic LNG 2 Project in the Tazovsky District of Yamal-Nenets Autonomous Region, it is planned to construct the PLANT - a fixed nearshore terminal for the production, storage and offloading of Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG) and Stabilised Gas Condensate (SGC). Each of the three trains will be supported on a Gravity Based Structure (GBS) and located within a seaport to harbor the PLANT and facilitate the offloading of the LNG and SGC (stored inside the GBSs) to LNG carriers and condensate tankers. The installation, on site, of the three GBSs will take place in in 2022, 2023 and in 2025.

SAREN (Saipem Renaissance) is CONTRACTOR for the installation of the GBS. SUB-CONTRACTOR Boskalis LLC is to perform the dredging of the pit and rock installation work packages.

The works of Boskalis comprise of:
1. Engineering and construction of underbase foundation for three (3) LNG TRAINS, including supply of the necessary material
2. Engineering and installation of scouring protection for two (2) LNG TRAINS, including supply of the necessary material
3. Backfilling operations for three (3) LNG TRAINS, including material
profile_positions.title: SHEQ Manager Artic LNG 2 Project Russia

profile_positions.description:
Contract Value +/- €110 Million
500.000 Hours LTI Free

The scope of work includes excavation and backfilling works as well as rock installation.

Pipeline and umbilical pre-lay trenching operations will be undertaken by a Trailer Suction Hopper Dredge (TSHD). Trench backfilling will occur after laying pipelines and umbilicals. The dredged soil shall be saved into stockpiles for backfilling operations. To compensate for soil losses, some additional imported soil will be required for the backfilling scope.

Rock protection installation will be pre and post-lay installations from a Fall Pipe Vessel (FPV) using local and potentially imported rock. The rock installations will also include creating rock foundations, berms and rock sleepers to span the seafloor and cross over existing live infield subsea infrastructure.

• Development, improvement and maintenance of Project 
  procedures and documentation
• Give advice about the execution of the work.
• Guide the subcontractor
• Participate in Client SHEQ meetings
• Support the Project Team
profile_positions.title: SHEQ Manager Kirinskoye GCF Development Project Russia

profile_positions.description:
Contract Value €50-€150 Million

Advising, arranging and controlling all COVID-19 related issues on the project to prevent the COVID-19 Virus to spread.

Energia del Pacifico - Acajutla, El Salvador
Connecting an offshore Floating Storage and Regasification Unit (FSRU) to an onshore power plant in El Salvador. The contract was awarded by Energia del Pacifico (EDP), a 378-MW liquefied natural gas (LNG)-to-power infrastructure project at the Port of Acajutla, El Salvador. The project will commence early 2020 and is scheduled to be operational by the end of 2021.
Contract Value:  150 Million
Project LTI Free

•	Control and guide all COVID related matter.
•	Arrange PCR test and make appointments with the laboratory
•	Lead a group of 2 HSE Officers, 2 Doctors,2 Nurses
•	Development, improvement and maintenance of Project SHEQ procedures and documentation.
•	Support the Project Director & Manager in project related issues.
•	Support the Project Team
•	Guide the subcontractors
profile_positions.title: Site COVID Manager, Energia del Pacifico - Acajutla, El Salvador

profile_positions.description:
Contract Value €300 Million

The Pasay Reclamation Development Project in Manila Bay, the Philippines, is a new and modern commercial and residential property development of SM Prime Holdings Inc. (the Employer). It is based on sustainable design principles and designed to international standards to ensure a safe living environment. The Project is being developed by the Employer in close cooperation with the Philippine Reclamation Authority (PRA) and the municipality of Pasay and involves development of approximate 400 ha of land reclamation.
profile_positions.title: HSE Manager Pasay Reclamation Development Project Philippines
